name: Flipper's Adventure
description:
This is a movement based game where you are playing as Flipper, a penguin, who must adventure through an icy landscape. Collect fish, avoid obstacles, and slide on ice as you make it through the game to reach a surprise destination at the very end!

The goal of this game is to allow the player to experience somewhat of a challenge within the movement, but still be able to complete the game and gain a full understanding of the adventure.

Assets are not my own.

Player Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Double tap spacebar to double jump

Enjoy the game, and thank you for playing!

Created by Gabby Gruvman and Tiffany Peng.
